article: Have you ever been accused of overprotecting your young children? In some cultures, that's a36 _ . All of nature testifies that protecting children is why God made parents. We cannot protect our young children enough. But in fact we cannot overprotect children's whole lives. The trick is to have your children37 _ of protecting their own selves by the time they become38 _ . To do this, always protect your children, but don't try to39 _ them from the world as they grow older. To be more specific, when children are five, they should live in a40 _ . They do not need to know all of the world's41 _ since they cannot solve them anyway. Rather, little children should be42 _ the wonders of God's world; things like the magic and the beauty of a butterfly. Then,43 _ , as your teenagers mature into an adult, address all the44 _ issues that he will need to know45 so that he may protect himself when the time comes. At the same time, slowly make him46 take on the responsibility for protecting himself as he shows himself worthy of trust. Whether or not you help your kids to47 _ the world, they are going to be48 _ to it at some point. You can try to49 hold back that day, but the wiser parents will avoid disaster by50 _ their child to face temptations. To prepare your children you will need to give them more than vital51 _ ; you must also create52 _ where they can learn how to exercise control over their own hearts. For instance, I allow my children to hold me accountable for all my words and actions. They also helped us53 _ which movies were inappropriate for us, as a family, to watch. Another way to bring your children out of their dream is to54 _ yourself in some tasks that they can join. They'll then be able to see the55 _ world first-hand, while still in a protected environment.
